wikipedia_page.main: Archibald Haworth Brown,  (born 10 May 1938), commonly known as Archie Brown, is a British political scientist. In 2005, he became an emeritus professor of politics at the University of Oxford and an emeritus fellow of St Antony's College, Oxford, where he served as a professor of politics and director of St Antony's Russian and East European Centre. He has written widely on Soviet and Russian politics, on communist politics more generally, on the Cold War, and on political leadership.

response: * Reform, Coup and Collapse: The End of the Soviet State by Professor Archie Brown
